definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The physical property of oscillator driven by quasi-constant field is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了准恒场驱动谐振子的物理特性。

sentences.english: Also the symmetry of the harmonic oscillation Potential is studeied in details.
sentences.chinese: 并且具体地讨论了谐振子势的对称性。

sentences.english: Its key part is a axisymmetric shell vibra-tory.
sentences.chinese: 它的核心部件是一个轴对称壳谐振子。

sentences.english: Starting from the nonlinear resonance pattern, we calculated third order polarizability, and gave the principle of the calculation.
sentences.chinese: 利用非简谐振子模型计算了三阶非线性极化率。

sentences.english: It is shown any states of harmonic oscillator are SCS.
sentences.chinese: 证明谐振子的任何状态都是薛定谔相干态。

sentences.english: A method for constructing orthonormalized eigenstates of annihilation operator b 3 - of a non harmonic is presented.
sentences.chinese: 构造了非简谐振子湮灭算符3次幂的正交归一本征态。

sentences.english: We can work out positions of a harmonic oscillator by numerical methods .
sentences.chinese: 我们可以按数值方法计算简谐振子的位置。

sentences.english: Finally the universal formula of higher order nonlinear polarizability has been given.
sentences.chinese: 利用非简谐振子模型计算了三阶非线性极化率。

sentences.english: For a harmonic oscillator the energy levels are evenly spaced .
sentences.chinese: 对谐振子来说，能级是等间隔的。

sentences.english: A cycle model of an irreversible Brayton heat engine working with harmonic systems is established in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一种不可逆谐振子系统布雷顿热机循环模型。

sentences.english: For both the quartic-anharmonics and double well potentials.
sentences.chinese: 针对四次方反谐振子势及其双阱势的束缚态。

sentences.english: It expounds that the electro-static Driven Comb Micro-resonant set is widely used in the linear driven equipment.
sentences.chinese: 静电梳微谐振子是微机械领域常用的直线型驱动装置。

sentences.english: This paper investigates the whole optimum performance of a endoreversible quantum Carnot refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 研究了内可逆谐振子量子卡诺制冷机的整体最优性能。

definition: eigenvalue (math.)/also written 特徵值|特征值
